31.description: Danyel has been God sent for me! I have had two Brazilian  Blow outs done by her and I cannot be a happier person! I also get my regular cuts done by her as well and cannot imagine going anywhere else. She is an extremely warm person and really listens to what you want. She's great about giving advice where needed and won't push you to do stuff you don't want to do as we have seen happen at many many places! You can call her and know she will call you back in a timely fashion and set up a time that's good for you. I can't rave about her enough! Very professional!

25.description: I did a little bit of research before getting the Brazilian Blowout because I had never had it done before & I was not sure how my hair would react. Danyel was very accommodating to all of my questions and concerns, she also offered me coupons and other specials for other products. I was nervous since she had never done my hair before, but despite my anxiety she made me very comfortable with in minutes and did a fabulous job. I love the results and the products I ended up purchasing.Its great to live in a world where every day is a good hair day. Thanks for being awesome Danyel, I can't wait to come back for highlights!

12.description: I did a little bit of research before getting the Brazilian Blowout because I had never had it done before & I was not sure how my hair would react. Danyel was very accommodating to all of my questions and concerns, she also offered me coupons and other specials for other products. I was nervous since she had never done my hair before, but despite my anxiety she made me very comfortable with in minutes and did a fabulous job. I love the results and the products I ended up purchasing.Its great to live in a world where every day is a good hair day. Thanks for being awesome Danyel, I can't wait to come back for highlights!

21.description: I am pretty sure that the Brazilian treatment did nothing to my hair.  Danyel seemed nice however ran late.  Her assistant was pretty unprofessional and didn't seem to know how to put the serum on my hair. It also wasn't so pleasant that Danyel was timing her while she was putting the serum on my hair. I bought the deep conditioner and the Moroccan oil shampoo/conditioner and that is the only think that actually has made my hair slightly different since this treatment. I would say don't waste your money on the Brazilian treatment done by Danyel. I read in several other reviews that Danyel l isn't doing this treatment properly and not using the proper serum and I seriously think that  this is most likely the case. Danyel didn't wear a mask and my hair didn't change. I also choose to get a haircut with Danyel right after the treatment and right when I left, I found split ends in my hair. It seemed like she was scared to cut my hair.  So I also would not waste your money on a hair cut with her.

16.description: I got a Brazilian Blowout from Danyel, a treatment I have had several times before. My hair ended up more curly and out of control than when I went in. Upon getting home, my roommate asked why I hadn't gotten the treatment... Only I had just come from the salon-- my hair was that curly.I called the next day and not only did she not offer to fix it, she told me that the product line only smooths hair, it does not make hair straighter and that she did it correctly.  Then, she told me that I could come in and she would teach me how to properly round brush my hair and that I needed to buy additional products from the line. Since i could not come back into the shop within two weeks she said she could not do anything because I might sabotage my hair using dove or suave.  When I asked for my money back, she refused.  When asked for tip back, she refused. She offered to take the shampoo back... I have had this treatment and one other like it- it straightens my hair when done properly.Aside from accusing me of trying to ruin my hair, insulting me in telling me she could teach me how to do it, and refusing to give me my money back- she was late and incredibly unprofessional (though she told me repeatedly that she is very professional).If I could give zero stars, I would.

17.description: I am pretty sure that the Brazilian treatment did nothing to my hair.  Danyel seemed nice however ran late.  Her assistant was pretty unprofessional and didn't seem to know how to put the serum on my hair. It also wasn't so pleasant that Danyel was timing her while she was putting the serum on my hair. I bought the deep conditioner and the Moroccan oil shampoo/conditioner and that is the only think that actually has made my hair slightly different since this treatment. I would say don't waste your money on the Brazilian treatment done by Danyel. I read in several other reviews that Danyel l isn't doing this treatment properly and not using the proper serum and I seriously think that  this is most likely the case. Danyel didn't wear a mask and my hair didn't change. I also choose to get a haircut with Danyel right after the treatment and right when I left, I found split ends in my hair. It seemed like she was scared to cut my hair.  So I also would not waste your money on a hair cut with her.

10.description: I don't recommend buying a Groupon here.  I bought the keratin treatment supposedly that it would last up to 3 months. And it just lasted 2 days. My hair is dull, dry, and frizzy again. I guess you get what you paid. I think Groupon shouldn't be advertising business like this. Instead of making their costumers  coming back, they are just make them running away.

11.description: She gave me an appointment and didn't show. Her business was not even located at 100 E Walton. Turned out for the best since the reviews are so bad, and very well deserved. So unprofessional!

26.description: I had an AMAZING experience with danyel. Not only is she experienced with color, but she can do extensions AND color together, which is rare to find in Chicago area.  She is also very friendly, personable and has great bed side manners.  Her salon is adorable. If you want someone very confident and qualified in her work, look no more, you have found the right stylist.  I will def come back if I am ever in town again! :) h

27.description: I have gone to Danyel to get a haircut twice and very pleased! My hair is very difficult, though very straight, if cut wrong, can look boxy or choppy. But she knows how to cut it. This last time, I did  not even tell her what i wanted but it seems like she knew and it came out great. I recently lost weight so this was a great addition to my new look. I will be returning for a keratin treatment and color before my vacation next month.  Thanks Danyel for helping me feel beautiful again!

0.description: This girl is amazing.  I needed her in an emergency extension issue and she totally stepped up!  Sweet and accommodating,I'll be back!

20.description: This review is long overdue but Danyel did a really nice job on a last minute up-do for me last summer. I found her through her yelp reviews, and she came on very little notice and drove from her home on her day off to do my hair for a wedding. I loved the up do. It was lovely and I got lots of compliments on it (pics to follow soon). She also did my make-up but didn't have much time to spend on it because I was running late, but she did a good job considering. I would just recommend that she increase her make-up selection if she wants to also do make-up.Overall, I thought she was fabulous and was especially great at up-do's which is really the only service I used her for. Her customer service was also wonderful-- from driving last minute from her home to accommodate me, to driving all the way to my hotel afterwards to drop off my phone charger that I had left behind. Talented and a sweetheart! I would definitely go back to her to try her other services next time I am in Chicago

19.description: I love Danyel!  It's so hard to find someone who does an awesome Brazilian Blowout.  Plus she was super accommodating to my schedule (I needed to make a last minute appointment change and she totally squeezed me in between other appointments).  It was a great experience and I'll definitely be going back!

33.description: Danyel did a fantastic job on my first brazilian blowout. I can hardly believe how manageable my typically curly/frizzy mane has become. I typically wear my hair curly and in the past had been resigned to many bad hair days. Simple things like a windy day, riding my bike or (gasp!) attempting to diffuse my hair were disasters. The brazilian blowout has transfused my curl into a softer wave, and has left my hair soft and manageable. Since getting it every day is a good hair day. I can even diffuse my hair without any problems. Danyel did a great job explaining the product to me. She also colored my hair, and that turned out very well. I plan to repeat this in a few months and will definitely go to Danyel.

2.description: I purchased the Groupon deal for the Brazilian Blowout. You get what you pay for!! Since the deal was half off, I suspect she only used HALF as much of the product as she normally would use. That's the only explanation I can reasonably come up with since the blowout lasted all of one week and did not improve my hair in any way. Maybe if I paid full price I would have gotten a proper dosage of the treatment and it would have actually worked!! She was somewhat rude and made sure to remind me at the end that the tip should be on the INITIAL pre-discount value of the service. Thanks but no thanks!

32.description: I love going to Danyel for cut and color because not only does she do a great job, but she always takes into consideration what's healthy for my hair. Most hair stylists will throw any chemical on your hair and not care about the repercussions it will have later on. Danyel always takes into considering my specific hairy type and everything. I am always pleased with my hair style and color....my hair always looks healthy. If you have  thick curly hair like I do, you know how hard it is to find someone who can REALLY make it work....and Danyel is awesome.

18.description: Love this Salon!! I went to Danyel Nicole a few months back and received a Brazilian Blowout that I purchased off Groupon. I was a bit hesitant because of my frizz curly hair. I am very particular on who I let do my hair. She eased all my worries by explaining the entire process to me. My hair was silky, smooth and no frizz. It has been a few months and my hair is still wonderful. I did purchase the after care products which helps me get ready in the morning in half the time. Besides the good service, I love the private vintage atmosphere she has provided. The design and detail is like non other salon I have ever been too.(even the coasters are vintage Audrey Hepburn) Also did I mention she give a complementary glass of wine! Let's just say I am a future customer and can't wait until my next Brazilian Blowout.

13.description: Do NOT get a Brazilian Blowout here.I have never gotten any other service here, so the others may be fine, but unfortunately my experience here was so bad that I feel that I have to warn others.I got two Brazilian Blowouts here (I know, you would think that I would have learned the first time). The first one was done by Danyel's assistant, so when I saw zero results the next day, Danyel agreed to redo the treatment. She did, and I saw a moderate level of results after that one. I had purchased a discounted voucher for a Brazilian Blowout during my first appointment (before I knew that the results weren't good), so several months later, I came in for that one.The salon experience was fine, but the next day, I again saw zero results. This time Danyel had at least put the solution on herself, and the assistant just dried and straightened it. There were no results, though - a little softer, but nothing else.I emailed Danyel about it, and she basically said too bad, and something about giving my hair a break from the treatment so that it would work again. I have gotten 15+ of these in the past and I find it hard to believe that they would all of a sudden conveniently stop working when Danyel started doing them.There are also several other yelpers who have had the same experience, so this doesn't seem to be a one off bad experience. I now have to go spend another $150+ right away to get another one if I want to see any results.

4.description: Danyel Nicole has done my Keratin treatments twice and I loved them both! She uses good hair products and does an excellent job making hair look smoth and shiny!!I would definetely recommend her  for your next booking. Also, she is professional and friendly :-)

24.description: I brought my mom to Danyel for a brazillian blowout and was so impressed!! This was her first BB and her hair is RIDICULOUSLY course and poofy, especially when it's humid outside. By the time Danyel finished, my mom's hair was smoother and softer than I've ever seen it in my entire life. I was floored, to say the least. Danyel was very professional & knowledgeable, and even accommodated us by staying late on a Sunday night for the appointment because my mom was visiting for the weekend from Dallas and Danyel was booked up. The suite she works out of is very newly renovated, and the facilities overall are great. You can't go wrong with Danyel!

6.description: FYI... I didn't even go hereI bought a $99 groupon for the Keratin treatment, and booked an appointment.  Upon booking, she told me that there was a 20% cash tip expected and she took down all my credit card information in case of cancellation.  I was a little put off by how "pushy" I felt she was, so I looked up yelp reviews.After reading yelp reviews about the keratin treatment (all under 2 stars), I quickly returned the groupon and called to cancel.  I left a message asking that I receive an e-mail confirmation with regards to the cancellation because the fact that she had all my credit card information made me nervous.I called a couple times and I went to voicemail again.  I never got the cancellation confirmation, but I also have not been charged... yet.She crashed and burned with regards to professionalism... again, I think this place is so sketch and I haven't even walked in.

22.description: I got a Brazilian Blowout from Danyel, a treatment I have had several times before. My hair ended up more curly and out of control than when I went in. Upon getting home, my roommate asked why I hadn't gotten the treatment... Only I had just come from the salon-- my hair was that curly.I called the next day and not only did she not offer to fix it, she told me that the product line only smooths hair, it does not make hair straighter and that she did it correctly.  Then, she told me that I could come in and she would teach me how to properly round brush my hair and that I needed to buy additional products from the line. Since i could not come back into the shop within two weeks she said she could not do anything because I might sabotage my hair using dove or suave.  When I asked for my money back, she refused.  When asked for tip back, she refused. She offered to take the shampoo back... I have had this treatment and one other like it- it straightens my hair when done properly.Aside from accusing me of trying to ruin my hair, insulting me in telling me she could teach me how to do it, and refusing to give me my money back- she was late and incredibly unprofessional (though she told me repeatedly that she is very professional).If I could give zero stars, I would.

15.description: I came to Danyel a couple of months ago with a deal for a Brazilian blowout treatment. I have long, curly, frizzy hair.  Danyel is an experienced, competent, and thorough stylist. After the treatment, she told me that she wished my hair would have turned out a little better and recommended a new product that she got in called Trissola that she liked much better. Great salesperson that Danyel! She gave me another super deal if I pre-purchased another treatment at the visit. I was fairly happy with the results of the Brazilian brand treatment, but last weekend I got the Trissolo formaldehyde free keratin treatment, and it was even better. I highly recommend it. My hair is much more smooth, frizz free, and shiny. She also gave me a great hair cut! Even though her salon is not exactly close to me, I will keep going back. It's worth it to me for good service.

7.description: Danyel was awesome! I'm a first timer and she offered many suggestions as to how to keep my blowout in tip top shape as long as possible.I have already recommended her thruout my office and bought my blowout for the next time.I will be back!

8.description: I love Danyel. She has made me love my unruly hair. She does the best keratin treatments. The only reason I've taken one star off is that I've often had wait over an hour past my appointment time as she is usually running behind. I've scheduled on time flexible days knowing this now. But her brilliant ability to do hair is well worth the wait.

30.description: All the reviews below are 100% accurate.Got my Brazilian Blowout by Danyel today! SOOO amazing, and I'm blonde again! No more relaxers for me :)Danyel is on a mission to save my hair, 3 months in, so far, so good, I'm so thankful!

3.description: Danyel Nicole does magic with curls!My hair is naturally curly, dry and fine. For those of you familiar with that curly hair number system, I think it's a 3c. My curls are tighter than 3b but not as voluminous as 3c. Curly hair just can't make up its mind...Anyway, whenever I go to a salon, I always hope that the stylists don't freak out when they see me walk in with my curls. I also hope they don't bug me to straighten it. I found some sort of online deal for Danyel Nicole and tried her out.Thankfully, Danyel was not at all intimidated by my hair. I went to her last year and gave her a picture of the style I wanted.  It was my summer 'do from 2011. Basically short and layered.  Wow! Her cut came out nicer than the picture (sorry Tease Salon).Now usually, once my hair grows out, it just becomes a big mop of curls. It looks nothing like the style from a year before.  Well, I don't know how she did it, but the style/shape looks the same from last year, just a little longer! I know my hair is longer than it looks, though, when I try to comb it...I'm going somewhere else for my summer cut this year, but not because I was dissatisfied with Danyel. Just can't afford an $80 price tag for a cut and blow dry. But if that's your range, check her out. If you have a mop of curls, she just might be worth the price for you anyway!

14.description: Danyel never fails to impress me. Every time I get a hair cut I receive countless number of compliments. She has an eye for beauty and knows how to make you look your best. I can't wait to see her again.

attributes.Hair Types Specialized In: African-American Hair, Asian Hair, Curly Hair, Extensions, Straight Perms, Coloring

12.description: Lotions, potions, and all manner of alchemy for the skin!The staff is more than willing to sell you whatever it is you need, or dont need.  And with a complete facial you're sure to feel years younger and much lighter in the pocketbook. What a treat!

7.description: I don't live in Chicago so can only comment on the online store.  I used to order from this salon and received products quickly (same day or next day shipment) with long product best-by dates. Haven't ordered from them in a couple of years and just last week ordered a few Dr Hauschka kits.  Took a day or 2 longer for package to go out, which was not a huge deal.  Problem was, some of the vials were expired, and most of the rest of the products have a best-by date within the next 4 months, indicating they've been sitting around for a while.  At best, these should be given out as samples.  I'd bet Dr Hauschka HQ wouldn't be pleased to learn of this.

20.description: Lotions, potions, and all manner of alchemy for the skin!The staff is more than willing to sell you whatever it is you need, or dont need.  And with a complete facial you're sure to feel years younger and much lighter in the pocketbook. What a treat!

19.description: Megan is the BEST.  I also followed her here from Bliss and haven't regretted it for a second!  She is fantastic, super sweet, great at what she does, and the bonus is that waxing at Skin 1 is half the price of Bliss!  While I only go to her for waxing (I'm not a big facial person), I don't think I will ever go to anyone else.  She does a great job on my brows/lips with as little pain as possible.  Plus, this is a cool store and they have every skin product your could imagine.  Do yourself a favor...visit this store definitely book a waxing appointment with Megan.

1.description: WHATEVER you do DO NOT order items on line from this place!! Don't go there either. They will take your money and lie to you. You will never get what you ordered and doing a return is impossible. I ordered 4 items and got two of them. After repeated phone calls (5) I was told they were out of stock with no ship date!!!  When trying to get my money back I was hung up on twice!  God help you if you have to deal with Colleen. She is rude, blames the customer, and will hang up on you. The items I purchased were for Christmas presents that my mom never got. Two months later and I am still trying to resolve and get my money back. They are running a SCAM and make it so difficult that people give up and lose their money.  I work in Hospitality and am a buyer. I know that back ordered items are given a ship date. I can only imagine the experience from the inside of this place. When I asked for a Manager the 5 times I called I was told she was not available. Save your money people and go to Amazon for your Skin Care needs. These people are CROOKS and they should be shut down. I am also going to the BBB and have plenty of documentation to cause a huge issue for them. They are thieves. I can only imagine if I were elderly or a sick person-- I would just give up and let them keep the money. Wretched business. Wretched customer service.Thank you Gloria for your reply. A normal business practice does not charge customers for items until they are SHIPPED when on back order. Then you get an update giving you the option to cancel if too much time has lapsed. You don't simply keep people's money and not update or ship the merchandise. It's unlawful. Most comments below state the same grievance. I think you may want to look into that before this really gets too big to handle and change how your website is charging customers for out of stock items. It's a simple fix.

2.description: Terrible experience.  I placed a $200 order (two items) and immediately received a call advising that they were both out of stock (if so, they should advise customers prior to accepting the order) but that I would receive the order in 2 weeks.  Oddly enough, my credit card was charged immediately, including the express delivery premium I paid at the time of order.  Three weeks later, I called and was told that both items were now in stock and had been shipped.  Four weeks later, I called.  Nothing had been shipped yet but one item was still in stock and could be shipped.I cancelled and will never visit that site again.  They're dishonest.

9.description: I love Yonka skin products and finally got to this store to replenish my supplies.  I got wonderful help from an employee named Sunshine.  She offered me quick advice with no sales pressure.  I took her card when it turned out that she also performs facials at the salon. Today I had my first facial with Sunshine and I will definitely return.  She is a fabulous esthetician and her facial rejuvenated my skin and my mood.  As usual, Yonka treatments leave my skin looking and feeling wonderful.  I strongly recommend this salon.

6.description: I've shopped here for over 10 years and I was disappointed today. They were low on inventory and had no samples to offer - at least not what I asked for. I was, however, offered a few products that I couldn't use. Finally, pay close attention during your transaction! I was given a receipt with the correct amount but asked to sign a cc authorization for a higher amount. Now I have to wait two days for a credit. The sales clerk gave me 2 refund receipts and then took them back and I had to ask for proof of the credit transaction. She must have started her New Year's celebration early. The good news is that my products should last at least 6 months and I won't have to go back for a while.

18.description: Sunshine at Skin 1 is awesome.First, Skin 1 sells the leading brands in beauty and employ the most knowledgeable, courteous, and professional staff.And second, I absolutely rave about Sunshine. She was referred to me by a college, who I admired for her beautiful skin and perfectly shaped and well defined eyebrows. Sunshine, she gave me the most relaxing & cleansing facial I ever had. She made me feel comfortable from the start with her calm manner and knowledge of all products. She listened to the issues I was having with dry patches and made some recommendations that worked out perfectly for me, (Glymed Plus ROCKS!). I have been a loyal client since.Sunshine is "The One" and only Esthetician in Chicago that doesn't have me breaking out after a waxing or a facial. I love her for that!!!  I have had a great experience with her every time. She gives great massages, facials, and she is a WAXING MASTER. I have had the Microdermabrasion done at other places, but they never do it long enough. I only saw the benefits when I had it done with Sunshine. She also does my make-up for all the events I attend. I recommend the Jane Iredale line, it's 100% minerals with no pore-clogging fillers, blends into your natural skin color, and keeps my skin healthy. I've even gone to bed with it on and didn't break out.Sunshine does my eyebrows, which I always receive compliments on. I highly recommend asking for her.  She practices what she preaches and looks great. She has given me the best eyebrows, the best make-up tips, and keeps my skin flawless, and for that I keep going back.

10.description: I love this store. For a beauty junkie like me, it's a convenient one stop shop for a lot of cult and obscure beauty brands that I'd usually have to order online or go store-hopping for. Yon-ka, Juice Beauty, Phytomer, Somme Institute, Dermalogica, Decleor.... there be plenty! Necessarily prices are steeper than a drugstore, but a drugstore wouldn't have these things. They have a really good return policy too if things don't work -- 45 days and 75% of product left. They also have samples of pretty much everything if you ask, and now and then they have decent storewide sales.Note, most of the sales assistants will probably ignore you. This can either be awesome or not, depends what you like. I like it, because then I can try lots of things and not be pressured. You can ask for help though, and I would definitely ask for Sunny if she's there. She single-handedly saved my skin when I first moved to Chicago and my skin went haywire from the dryness. She really knows her stuff and will be honest about what you will need - or don't. Unlike the sales reps at Sephora, she spends more than 3 seconds looking at your skin!

13.description: I love Megan.  I'll follow her wherever she goes.  I followed her from Bliss and I don't regret it in the least.  The salon itself is very nice.  It is clean and the product wall is overwhelming there are so many good products.  Back to Megan though - she seriously is the best.  I feel confident in her hands that not only will my skin be glowing but that my wax won't knock me out of commission for a week.  Let's face it, it isn't fun yet she somehow makes you forget you're even having it done.  Skin 1 is lucky to have her and I'll be a loyal customer as a result.

16.description: I love this place.  I use hard to find Eminence products from Hungary.  They have a great selection at Skin 1.  They ship for free and always get the products in a reasonable time frame.  I love the variety of products they have at Skin 1.

17.description: An esthetician's dream store. Ling has every product you could want if you are obsessed with skin like I am. I find myself constantly referring people to her store.  Its always a learning experience for me as she has all the latest in products. Love it!

15.description: I'm a proud veteran to the art that is Brazilian waxing, so when I moved to the city recently I felt panicky that I wouldn't be able to replace my favorite waxist in my former city. Fortunately I couldn't  have been more wrong. If you want the best wax ever, get in to see Sunshine. She is completely meticulous and serious about her job. The prices are very reasonable as well, so what more could you need? Sunshine also really knows her way around the eyebrows too, so no matter your hair/skin needs, she'll be able to take care of you.

0.description: I have been a customer of skin1 for many years.For my last three orders that I placed online, I received confirmation, my credit card was charged immediately, four days later I received an email  informing me  that the products I ordered were out of stock and  will not be available for 12 business days.I believe that before charging their customers, skin1 should notify the customers  the item they are ordering is out of stock and not charge for it until they ship the order.I called to cancel my order, and was informed that my  refund will take 7-10 days!In short, this company is using my money for at least 2 to 3 weeks at a time before they pay me back! I will  NOT be buying from Skin1 again.

5.description: The store ended up correcting the erred shipment, which was a seamless process once customer service got involved. Thank you!!

11.description: Megan is the best esthetician in Chicago!  She used to work at Bliss (where the bastards made her go by Libby since there were two Megans), and I will follow her wherever she goes!  The woman has the golden touch when it comes to waxing AND facials.  Skin1's facilities are spotless, and their wax is the kind that grabs only the hair and rips off without cloth strips, so it's great for sensitive skin.Skin1 is also a smorgasbord of beauty products.  Believe me, if you can't find it here, odds are extremely low that you can find it anywhere else in Chicago.

8.description: This is a terrific spa, in a very low-traffic area.  It's worth the trip though.  Nicole is a terrific esthetician, very professional and knowledgeable.  I am so happy I found this place.  The prices are fair as well!

3.description: Ordered Yon-ka products with free shipping, received them after 3 business days. All with exp date 2017, authentic products. Pleased and will order again

14.description: I have been getting Brazilians for the last 8 years.  I have gone to many different places, most in Chicago, some in DC, and a few in Michigan, depending on where I am traveling.  Hands down, Sunshine at Skin 1 is the BEST person I have ever seen.  Normally I prefer places that take all of 15 minutes, in and outta there, let's face it, the process is not a fun one and I never expect much other than having the hair off.  Sunshine took about 45 minutes and it was the least painful experience of my life.  She used two different waxes, pulled from various angles and was as precise as I have ever known someone to be.  Dare I say, it was almost pleasant!  I am not kidding.  I will never go anywhere else.   It was the first time I felt like my Brazilian was actually a spa experience and received the best service for the price.

4.description: Their customer service, while responsive, was poor in meeting customer expectations. I ordered items and used express shipping to ensure they arrived on time. Not only did they not arrive on time but they were out of stock. This could have been easily avoided by updating their website with currently stocked items, or a note saying "currently out of stock." So not only do I have to pay for return shipping but I am also losing money on what I already spent on express shipping. Terrible returns system and customer care!!!!  It's 100% their fault.

1.description: Juana is a facial goddess. I no longer allow anyone else near mine. Her expertise and skill are reflective in the results.  Her product recs are spot-on and she 'gets' that $ need be respected and all the damage that we've done can't be fixed in one visit.  In fact, my skin continues to look better over time. Her work goes way beyond maintenance. Her methods are thoughtfully implemented and she tweaks as needed to make incremental improvements.  Icing - she has the most beautiful, lovely contagious spirit. No-brainer. You'll feel blessed that you found her and thank me for this review.

2.description: Simply the best. I am not one to write reviews but after this facial I had to spread the word!! Juana has such an amazing personality and is just an uplifting presence (like previous reviewers have noted). I am 26 and have suffered from moderate acne for most my life. I have seen numerous dermatologists and tried a variety of acne medications but nothing has worked. I have sensitive combination skin so I'm always hesitant to try new things on my face.  I decided to give Juana a try after reading some of her reviews and hearing about her facials from some friends. The facial felt great and the results exceeded every expectation I had. My skin looked and felt rejuvenated right away. She also recommended a skin care regimen and gave me a great moisturizer that has worked wonders on my sensitive skin. It has been a few weeks now since the facial and using the skin care products Juana recommended and I am extremely happy with the way my skin looks. I have only had one facial so far but with results like these I can guarantee that I'll be back for many more. I've already booked my next facial :).

0.description: I went to Juana for the first time yesterday.  I was tired of the spa facials that feel quite pleasant, but actually do little to change the quality of my skin.  I wanted a facial that would work to improve my skin problems:  mature skin, sun damage, fine wrinkles and lines, tired and stressed skin. Juana spent several minutes listening to what I thought were my problem areas and my expectations.  She then suggested a medical facial.  I immediately trusted Jauna and gave her permission to do "whatever she thought I needed".  During the medical facial she asked permission to do a mini peel.  I agreed.A medical facial is far more in depth and intense than a spa facial.  I was never in pain  but I could feel the materials she applied in a tingling sort of way.  The mini peel was a little more intense, but still I never felt uncomfortable.  During the procedure Juana explained to me what she was doing and why.  At the end Juana wanted me to keep the product on my face with instructions not to wash me face until this morning.Leaving her office  I felt uplifted and felt that  this facial is the best facial I ever had.  Plus I felt that I had an Esthetician that was actually addressing my skin problems.Today I washed my face.  Wow! My skin looks amazing,  The skin was extremely clean,  fine lines and age spots were reduced, and my skin is absolutely glowing.  I look several years younger with just the one visit.  I keep looking in the mirror in awe of what Juana accomplished with just one visit.The medical facial and mini-peel cost $200 which I thought was quite reasonable for  what I received.  Juana does not accept tipsJuana is knowledgeable, highly skilled, upbeat, and very friendly.  She never pressured me to buy products.  She also freely shared her knowledge with me.  I made another appointment for the last of February.  I am so excited by the results I see in my skin after just one visit that I can hardly wait for my next visit.Juana also does permanent cosmetics.  I want her to dye my eye lashes so I no longer have to wear mascara.I absolutely recommend Juana Shin. The results are amazing.

Tamika is the ONE!  I love that she truly focuses on her clients (unlike some salons that hold you hostage due to multiple appointments at the same time). I told Tamika what I wanted, she did better than I envisioned and in record time!  I cried afterwards because I live out of state and I don't visit Chicago often.  I just wish I could see her every week.

28.description: I had a really good experience at Salon Snob. The owner is the only one who works there, and she is so sweet! It was nice because it was just us the whole time, so we got to get to know each other better than you normally would. It struck me that she is just such a real person.I got a deep conditioning treatment & blow out via a Groupon. She loved that I had used the Groupon, which was nice compared to some frosty receptions I've heard about at other places. She started with a shampoo, then put the hair mask in and gave me a wonderful hand massage. Then she shampooed again and offered me magazines and a beverage while she went to get the hot towel. I asked for water, so she gave me a real glass with bottled water. So nice and homey! Then she gave me a hot towel and did a blow out. She did a great job. My hair looks super shiny and bouncy. She also explained what all the products were doing just so I would know, but she didn't try to sell me anything, which I also appreciated. Also, even though the appointment technically would have been 2 hours, she got it done in one and still had me feeling relaxed. Loved how she was efficient yet friendly.Definitely a loyal customer now! Even if I see a groupon for another place, I'll probably come back to Jordyn. Bonus: She said she'd be in the area for awhile!Note: The salon is a little hard to find by the address alone. If you go down the stairs next to the Gaylord Indian restaurant, through the Phoenix Salon doors, then continue through the back of that salon and the different suites all have individual doors on the left.

1.description: Jordyn is absolutely amazing! I have never been so happy with my blonde hair! Not to mention her lip snob collection! I will continue to go to Jordyn for all my lip and hair needs! I highly recommend you book your next appointment here!

9.description: Love my new haircut! Jordyn did a fantastic job. I went in to get 7 inches cut off and left with a medium layered bob (Jordyn was even able to donate my hair for me!). Cameron and Jordyn are both super fun and personable, which made the overall haircut an even better experience. I felt like I was hanging out with some friends... while getting my hair cut haha. I'm glad I went to Jordyn for such an extreme haircut, she definitely knows what she's doing!

29.description: Jordyn Daniels is not your average hair stylist.  After being the head stylist for other 5 star salons, I was thrilled when I found out she was finally opening up her own salon.  Her skills are incredible and my hair always looks amazing.   I have used her for darkening, highlights, haircuts and she even did my hair design and make up for The Miss Bikini USA competition.  She is truly a gem.

23.description: Jordyn Daniels is amazing! I stumbled upon her thorough Groupon and haven't looked back. Jordyn is a hair extension expert!  They always look completely natural and beautiful.  She gives amazing blowouts and I always leave feeling like a super model! Her prices are more than reasonable, especially considering she is located in the Gold Coast!!! I recommend her to everyone!!!!

5.description: Incredible doesn't even begin to describe how amazing Jordyn is! She did an amazing job cutting and styling my hair, it's never looked better. The attention to detail and the care she dedicates to every customer is genuine. Her place is adorable, not your traditional salon but that's what makes it amazing. She's super bubbly and I loved spending time with her while she cut my hair. I HIGHLY recommend her!!

31.description: So glad I happened to find her!  Another sylist I was going to see got sick, and she kindly agreed to sub for her.  Great highlights and cut, and a new procedure to my hair that I have never had heard of and just love!   She also talked me out of some things she thought didn't suit my hair.  Love her, honest, funny, and great in all regards!  CJ

25.description: It's been a while since I've found a stylist I really liked. Jordyn did an amazing job and I'll definitely be back. She took the time to discuss what we were going to do when I came in - asking questions to learn about how I am with my hair (I like to air dry in the summer sometimes, relatively low maintenance in general). Then she gave suggestions and made sure we were in agreement before we started. She really took her time with the cut and cared about making sure everything with it was perfect. My cut is amazing and I've already received so many compliments on it. On top of that, she was a pleasure to sit and chat with during my appointment. I'm incredibly pleased and relieved to have found someone who has charm and skill.I also got a keratin treatment with her. I've had a few in the past and some were better than others - this one is great! She uses GK, which I prefer (it's so excellent and makes my hair incredibly shiny and smooth). She takes her time and applies it well - my hair looks amazing!Side note - Jordyn rents space in a suite of salon units (it's really nice because it's private and you have her full attention). The space is down some stairs and the door says only Suite 102. It's the right door. Head on in and you'll see her suite.Go to see Jordyn - you won't regret it!

12.description: I've been to 3 hair places before being referred to Jordyn by a co-worker. I had a similar 1:1 setup at home so was happy when I learned that's the same way Jordyn operates. She's such a genuine, bubbly and dedicated person who always puts 100% in to everything. I love my color and it lasts me longer than any other salon I've been to. I recommended her to do the hair styling for my sisters wedding and it was great. She's not the most inexpensive, but to me it's worth it when you're paying for quality and longevity. It's always a great experience and I trust her completely with my hair! Definitely recommend her to new clients because she knows what she's doing!

21.description: Fantastic. I've bounced around to many salons but I've never had quite the amazing experience that I had here!! She was so kind and had a passion for perfection which was obviously my benefit :-) I'd highly recommend her to anyone extremely picky about their hair. The space is smaller than any salon but it's cute and comfortable.

16.description: Finally! A stylist who has it all!  After leaving my beloved hair stylist in Minneapolis, and moving to Chicago I was on the hunt for a stylist who not only was the best at what they did, but also made their clients feel welcomed in a clean environment. Well Jordyn Daniels has exceeded all my expectations! I walked into Snob Salon ready for a subtle change and something to make me feel revitalized. Jordyn's color job was suburb. I left with a gorgeous color, earning an instant, "I love your hair," from my husband. Also, I have to mention that my hair had shine that could be seen for miles.  In addition to her amazing styling and color skills, Jordyn is an absolute pleasure to be around- she is upbeat and friendly making you feel like a truly valued client. I am so thrilled that I found Jordyn, and I plan to make many returns to Snob Salon.

17.description: Let me start off by saying I never write reviews and have never been loyal to just one hairstylist....until I experienced Salon! It was pure luck that I tried a Groupon deal with Salon Snob, looking to get a good deal and a quick trim. Jordyn is hands down the best stylist I've ever had (oh, did I mention I lived in Manhattan and used to get my hair done there?!) Not only is she extremely talented at what she does but she goes above and beyond to make you feel comfortable and completely satisfied with your overall experience. I've gone to her for cuts and color and am always amazed that I can show her a picture or even explain what I'm thinking and she always does what I want and makes sure it's what I want throughout the entire appointment. I love her and I would follow her to any location!! Of course I'm not the only one that thinks she's amazing, so book her in advance! I never leave my appointments without booking my next one! Thanks Jordyn!!!!!!!

10.description: I LOVE this girl! She does amazing work. I scheduled a blow-out--and she told me about a makeup application promo that she was running as well. So, I got that done, too. Let me tell you, this girl is a real stylist. I just moved here a couple months ago and I couldn't imagine going to anyone else now! My hair looked amazing, and my makeup was flawless. I got compliments all night long. Other awesome side notes: it's her own private room--so you don't have to hear tons of other people. She offers bottled water and magazines-(good ones, too) She uses great hair products..And she's incredibly sweet and easy to talk to.

11.description: Jordyn did an amazing job cutting and styling my hair. I left her salon feeling great, my hair looked healthier and beautiful. Jordyn was able to fix my hair after a few past cuts at other places left it looking less than perfect. I'm very happy with how my hair turned out and I had a great time getting glammed  up and chatting with Jordyn. I definitely recommend making an appointment!

26.description: I LOVE this girl! She does amazing work. I scheduled a blow-out--and she told me about a makeup application promo that she was running as well. So, I got that done, too. Let me tell you, this girl is a real stylist. I just moved here a couple months ago and I couldn't imagine going to anyone else now! My hair looked amazing, and my makeup was flawless. I got compliments all night long. Other awesome side notes: it's her own private room--so you don't have to hear tons of other people. She offers bottled water and magazines-(good ones, too) She uses great hair products..And she's incredibly sweet and easy to talk to.

27.description: I got vouchers for a haircut and semi-permanent eyelash extensions.  The haircut was fine, and Jordyn was really nice.  The problem was with the lashes.  I had them put on the Tuesday before Thanksgiving because we were going out and I thought I'd do something special.  The application was fine, but the lashes came off 2 days later, and they were supposed to last 1-2 weeks.  I was so careful!  She said no soap on your eyes, and I did not use soap on or near my eyes.  But when I took a shower Thanksgiving morning, the lashes came unglued.  I didn't even get them wet wet, but there was collateral spray (surely we are allowed to shower with the lashes on). My real true problem was that I texted Jordyn twice and gave her 5 days to respond, and she didn't.  So I got a refund, end of story.  I'm glad I used vouchers.

0.description: I started going to Salon Snob last year when I was new to Chicago. In desperate need of color and a cut and based on satisfied customers high reviews on Yelp as well as other social media sites, I decided to give Salon Snob a try. I am so glad that I did! Saying that Jordyn does a phenomenal job is an understatement. She's elite. I've been highlighting and coloring my hair for 15 years. I've frequented top salons in NYC and no one has ever done as beautiful of a job as Jordyn does. She is not happy unless her customer is happy. She takes great pride in her craft and her work reflects that. She is an absolute doll and the entire salon experience is fun. It's like chatting with an old friend while I wait for my color to process. Her salon is neat, clean, cozy, quaint, beautifully decorated, and very comfortable. She plays great music and even offers a variety of beverages. (And the sink has the most comfortable neck rest I've ever used.) If and when I move back to New York, I've already decided that I'll come back to Chicago for long weekends and hair appointments at Salon Snob. When you find a gem, you hold onto it tightly!

20.description: I don't understand why this place doesn't have any reviews for haircuts, coz Jordyn is awesome at styling! I bought a Groupon to this place when I was looking to get a haircut. I was sold when I saw the reviews and the proximity to my apt (just a couple of blocks away!). Jordyn was amazing although I was 5-10 mins late to my appt. She is super friendly, really personable and I didn't even realize how time flew by! We did 5 mins of consulting before we got to it since she wanted to know what I was looking for and I wanted her opinion and input about the same. Once we had "the look" decided, we just ended up chatting the whole time while she cut and styled my hair. And the end product was just what I wanted-in terms of length and style (something others haven't quite been successful at). The real test though was when I washed my hair and set my hair (just a regular blowdry), it was just what I wanted. I would like to mention this specifically since in my experience, and it might just be me, but every time I come out of a salon, I am pleased with my haircut and style but the minute I wash and blowdry my hair, I can never ever get it to look like it did the time of the haircut. Not this time. I got and continue to get the look I wanted and got when I left her salon space. THAT'S the level of expertise and skill that you'll get with Jordyn. I would TOTALLY RECOMMEND Jordyn. YOU ROCK!!

19.description: Jordyn IS THE BEST IN CHICAGO HANDS DOWN ... IT DOESNT GET BETTER... I say that because it's the truth... I contacted Jordyn about 2 weeks ago after only a few weeks earlier having the worst experience at another salon and my hair extensions and hair looked terrible ... I also in early April had plastic surgery and something went wrong and have been dealing with a terrible reaction which impacted my face and body so terribly so when I contacted Jordyn I was really feeling terrible about my looks I contacted her late on a Saturday afternoon after she had closed for the day and she is so busy online I thought omg I am never going to be able to get in for months I don't think a half and hour had passed and I received a phone call back from Jordyn and she simply couldn't of been more gracious and lovely ... I was so impressed and from that moment realized why she is so busy because she is just naturally dedicated to her profession and her class showed thru because what made her so successful is her professionalism and customer service first her talent wow I have never had an opportunity prior to tonight to have my new extensions hair color and cut done so amazingly it is hands down the best haircut and color I ever have had in my life and she just did it like she knew and I didn't even have to say one thing plus she just knew exactly how to put in my new hair extensions and she uses SHE by SO CAP which I have come to realize is the best but even the way she fuses the extensions is so different than anyone else I mean you can barely even see the bond ... I mean Jordyn is 27 years old that's it yet her ability is absolutely flawless which I feel can only come from someone smart enough to understand that to become great you must learn and that takes real humility she even just put the extensions right in my bangs which was exactly what I wanted but since no one had ever done it I figured it wasn't possible but the way Jordyn handles those bonds which is amazing and like no one else and she just knew and she just took the time to make sure it was done and done right She began my hair tonight at 5 pm and without one complaint took out my old extensions highlighted my hair washed it and put in the new extensions beautifully and with a complete full head taking that extra time to create these tiny bonds which feel like nothing in my hair and did my entire head plus the bangs cut my hair and we walked out of her salon at 10:40 pmAnd I am not sure I even have heard of any in my life even salon owners who would do all of that not only in that amount of time but she made those hours with her seem like nothing and I have been so sick the past almost 4 months and physically am still struggling to look better and Jordyn just made me feel so much better and did all of that for me with a smile on her face the entire time There is something very special about Jordyn she is one of the classiest people I have ever met with such a grace ease and beauty but with an understanding of people and maturity beyond her years Through out the darkest time in my life Jordyn who because of my circumstances fit me into her very busy schedule and I literally mean that I love my hair my hair color how she did my extensions and I mean it's the best of all three I have ever had and I mattered to her Just like anyone would what I respect the most is that is exactly how she treats every single one of her clients every time And tonight for the first time in months I smiled and felt better about myself as a woman I am 43 years old so one can say I have just had more years to try and find the best salon the best stylist and it took this long but I finally did and Jordyn is the best I have ever had Everything you hear is true she is the real deal and she has studied under the best and worked really hard and it shows No matter what you need done Jordyn is the one to contact period and I know she will make the time cause she is a true professional and if you need hair extensions hands down Jordyn is who you go too It will be the best decision you will make and will feel exactly as I do afterwards all of her clients are dead on right about her Chicago is incredibly lucky to have her it's the truth JORDYN IS THE BEST IN CHICAGO And no one can argue with the truth Thank you Jordyn

33.description: Jordan is such an amazing stylist! she got me in on such short notice for New Years and my hair turned out perfect! it stayed all night and I was getting compliment after compliment. I wouldn't even think of going anywhere else in Chicago after going to her!

2.description: I debated before writing this review, but decided that as a loyal Yelper that I couldn't just let this go as much as it sucks to have to write it. Disclaimer: Jordyn did NOT do my hair or makeup and I think that's where the problems arose. I made an appointment online through an automated system that is clearly flawed. It sent me 1000 text messages and emails before I'd even gotten close to my appointment time, never mind the day of. Just too many. Then the times for my makeup got mixed up and caused stress, but it was fixed fairly easily.I showed up and met the vibrant and bubbly Jordyn and wished I had known more about this place so I could have made a better decision. I definitely would have gone with her doing everything. She's put together and just gorgeous. I had an appointment to have makeup/hair done for a very important photo shoot/event the day of. I was paired with Madison for makeup and Camrin for hair. I walked in and had to find this little bitty room of a salon. Not typical at all and had I known that this was the way it was set up I definitely would have made a different choice. My mistake. Camrin and Madison were both the sweetest. I really loved their outgoing personalities and how kind and accommodating they were. I had made an appointment for a blowout with Camrin but when I sat down and got ready to have it done she pulls out these HUGE rollers. I have never in my life gotten a blowout with rollers. I expressed my hesitation and said that wasn't what I was looking for but was assured it would be fine. I showed her a picture of what I wanted with curls and was told she could do that. Camrin would blow out tiny sections of hair, one at a time, and then put a roller in. My roots are curly and she wasn't really getting those. It was really not a blowout. Then she gave me the curls I asked for and they doubled the cost of my blowout, but they didn't tell me until it was already done. I wouldn't have paid $55 for someone to curl my hair. My blowouts in NYC (that I get twice a week) are the same price whether I blow it straight, have it flat ironed, or curled. This was a VERY overpriced hairstyle. It also lasted one day. When I slept on it all the curls came out. It wasn't worth what I paid for it.I don't really want to get into the mess that was made of my makeup. Madison was clearly very new to this. My makeup was horrible and I had to do it all myself for my photo shoot. She used drug store products and was just not good at it. I was devastated. Jordyn did apologize and refund my makeup (rightfully so, it was awful), but charged me for the blowout and curl that didn't stay. I wish I had never come here, it really ruined my photo shoot and event. I agree that Jordyn probably does do a good job, unfortunately the people she hires to work for her don't.

34.description: Jordyn is an incredible talent!  I went to Salon Snob in desperate need for a change in color and style, and she totally delivered. Jordyn knows how to share her professional opinion while still listening to what her clients want - a rarity in stylists these days. She is an expert at partial highlights that really rev up your color and yet look natural, and her cuts are complicated but easy to maintain. I am getting compliment after compliment on my new look! As a bonus, she is as sweet as can be and I enjoy my time at her salon. The space is clean and private and close to all the Mag Mile shopping if you want to make a day of it downtown. As much as I love my hair now, I'm already looking forward to going back to see Jordyn again!

32.description: I love this place!  It is an individual suite so you are not crammed in a full, noisy salon.  Jordyn listens and offers great suggestions for you to look your best.  I have short hair and her cuts last me longer than any I have ever had.  Her technique allows me a lot of versatility when styling my hair and I always get a ton of compliments on my cut and style.  She treats every client as a canvas and creates the best look she can.

18.description: I won't trust anyone with my hair from now on! Jordyn is a hair wizard. I got EXACTLY what I had in mind, plus a very pleasant experience with a super cool lady. She only takes one client at a time, which makes it very personal and custom. You're not shouting at a stylist over 3 other blow dryers and stylists/customers. Such a good experience, even better hair stylist.

13.description: I absolutely LOVED Jordyn!  She gave me an amazing cut that made my long thin-ish hair seem fuller and gave it so much movement.  She was also a blast to chat with.  I've never felt the need to go to the same hair stylist, but I think Jordyn has changed my mind and I look forward to my next haircut!

4.description: What can I say... I've just got in from having my hair done by Jordyn and I absolutely love it! I tried highlighting my own hair at home and pretty much ruined it :( I phoned around to different hair salons in the Chicago area and just couldn't find a reasonably priced place.. Until I phoned salon snob and just from the phone call I received such a pleasant aura.. Jordyn is so polite and nice that I was instantly sold.. She's an amazing stylist and I'm glad I found her, she's done an amazing job and fixed my hair just how I imagined... I'll definitely be returning! Being from the UK and in the process of moving out to Chicago, I think I've found a new friend as well as a new stylist :) Thank you Jordyn :) *big kisses* x x x

24.description: Finally! A stylist who has it all!  After leaving my beloved hair stylist in Minneapolis, and moving to Chicago I was on the hunt for a stylist who not only was the best at what they did, but also made their clients feel welcomed in a clean environment. Well Jordyn Daniels has exceeded all my expectations! I walked into Snob Salon ready for a subtle change and something to make me feel revitalized. Jordyn's color job was suburb. I left with a gorgeous color, earning an instant, "I love your hair," from my husband. Also, I have to mention that my hair had shine that could be seen for miles.  In addition to her amazing styling and color skills, Jordyn is an absolute pleasure to be around- she is upbeat and friendly making you feel like a truly valued client. I am so thrilled that I found Jordyn, and I plan to make many returns to Snob Salon.

6.description: I walked into Salon Snob with not knowing what to expect. I opened the door to my own personal boutique salon. Super amazing. Jordyn's set up made me feel so special. I love that there weren't any other stylists and extra noise a larger Salon can make. Jordyn took the time to look through my hair and give me recommendations on all over color and partial highlights with a cut. I told her I wanted to go brighter and blonder for the summer. She perfected my color. I seriously have never had a blond color that looks so natural and complements my skin tone the way she has perfected it , is amazing. The trim was perfect. Just enough and not too much( unlike my last stylist). Jordyn really takes the time to get to know you as her client. Her personality is extremley fun and bubbly. Her product line is GK. This is the first time I have used it and in my opinion is way better than any other Salon product I have used. My hair is so soft.I received 5 compliments within a few hours of seeing her.  I'm extremley impressed and will continue to come back! Oh- scheduling is super easy and I love the reminder I get! Thanks Jordyn!

22.description: I am in town on business and found Jordyn on Yelp. Had a fantastic shampoo and blowdry- my hair is so pretty! Bouncy and soft - I don't need to worry about it for the rest of my conference.  Jordyn is very detailed and gifted. Will definitely come back next time I am in town.

15.description: Jordyn is the BEST!  Not only is she an amazing sytlist but she has personality to boot.  Wish I could give her more than five stars.  Seriously.

7.description: I don't understand why this place doesn't have any reviews for haircuts, coz Jordyn is awesome at styling! I bought a Groupon to this place when I was looking to get a haircut. I was sold when I saw the reviews and the proximity to my apt (just a couple of blocks away!). Jordyn was amazing although I was 5-10 mins late to my appt. She is super friendly, really personable and I didn't even realize how time flew by! We did 5 mins of consulting before we got to it since she wanted to know what I was looking for and I wanted her opinion and input about the same. Once we had "the look" decided, we just ended up chatting the whole time while she cut and styled my hair. And the end product was just what I wanted-in terms of length and style (something others haven't quite been successful at). The real test though was when I washed my hair and set my hair (just a regular blowdry), it was just what I wanted. I would like to mention this specifically since in my experience, and it might just be me, but every time I come out of a salon, I am pleased with my haircut and style but the minute I wash and blowdry my hair, I can never ever get it to look like it did the time of the haircut. Not this time. I got and continue to get the look I wanted and got when I left her salon space. THAT'S the level of expertise and skill that you'll get with Jordyn. I would TOTALLY RECOMMEND Jordyn. YOU ROCK!!

8.description: Really awesome experience. Jordyn is so passionate about her job and is super nice and helpful about hair care and anything else! I used a Groupon and got a really good haircut here. The GK hair products she offered were especially great and so reasonably priced, I will most definitely return for them.

30.description: Jordyn has extreme talent and is always helpful to all of my beauty needs! I highly recommend her services to all my friends and family!!!

3.description: I had been cutting my own hair for over 15 years because I could never find a stylist that would listen to how I wanted my hair to look.  I finally decided to try one last time to find a professional and selected Jordyn at Salon Snob.  I could not be happier!  Finally, someone that listened and got it right.  Jordyn is also incredibly personable and fun, I will continue to come to her for my hair, my search is finally over :).

14.description: Had a great first time experience! Not only did she blend out the issues left behind from my previous haircut, but she made it look ten times better! Jordyn's super professional, friendly, and goes the extra mile to make her clients feel and look amazing! I will definitely be going back to her again.

attributes.Hair Types Specialized In: African-American Hair, Asian Hair, Curly Hair, Perms, Extensions, Coloring, Kids' Hair

29.description: Why God can't there be a Negative Star Rating?Staying at the Hilton hotel, and needed a quick sandwich.My 2 Girls, who will eat anything you put in front of them, took 1 bite each and spit it out in the trash can.Sausage/ Egg/ Cheese bagel = Complete Flaming Fail.Doughy bagel + thin gray "meat" + volcanic hot microwaved egg substitute + not a single granule of seasoning.   Did we lose a war??It would have been more satisfying to eat my $10 bill.

42.description: Mediocre bagels (doughy and lacking in texture) and mediocre (weak) coffee, but what really gets me here is how utterly MISERABLE the employees are.  There was something about the cashier's voice.  It took me a minute to get it. I asked a couple of questions, and he answered them politely and with a great deal of detail.  But his voice wasn't just polite . . it was an almost sarcastic, sing song politeness, one that came off as smug.   I looked up, trying to figure out if he were being deliberately annoying, and then I placed it.I've been there, friend.  The dead end job that's so unbelievably brain numbing that you really do turn off your brain to get through it.   You develop a robotically happy tone to your voice, and learn to make eye contact with people without even seeing them.  You don't mean to be rude.  You've just stopped noticing the people you're serving.  You're thinking about something else so that you can get through the day.  Don't get me wrong - not every dead end job is like that.  Fact is, a good manager develops techniques to maintain a high morale - no one really takes the job of spreading cream cheese on a bagel seriously, so why not spread some positive energy around the work place?  Anyway, this is a place that clearly does not treat their workers well, and it shows.  You can feel the bad morale as soon as you walk in.  Who wants to support a business like that?

23.description: I mean it is an Einstein bagel. They are good and tasty. I've had the lox there and it was great. The people who work there are not that friendly but you don't go to this place for the service. You go to eat. But don't expect a seat too on the weekend because it is a small place and in a hotel.

47.description: The newest Chicago Einstein's is an "express," which means it is smaller than most and has a few limits on the menu.  The extremely friendly and slightly clueless staff seemed surprised when I wanted to buy a dozen bagels.  They insisted that two tubs of cream cheese were included in the cost, when from other outlets I knew that it wasn't.I'm glad this place opened near the hubby's office, my kids love their chocolate chip bagels.

8.description: Had breakfast here on my last day in Chicago,very small place but ok staff and good choices in breakfast.

31.description: Good bagels breakfast sandwiches for $5, but not worth it for a 25 minute wait. By the time I got my food it was Damn near lunch time.

34.description: Consistently good. Polite and efficient service.

16.description: I mean it is an Einstein bagel. They are good and tasty. I've had the lox there and it was great. The people who work there are not that friendly but you don't go to this place for the service. You go to eat. But don't expect a seat too on the weekend because it is a small place and in a hotel.

13.description: I used to live in Arizona and frequently went to Einstein. Therefore, when I was downtown I decided to stop in for a bite. Food was as expected, but very good. However, the staff was outstanding they were very friendly.

11.description: I mean I like Einsteins as much as the next guy, but the staff here is just the worst. Rude, incompetent, and couldn't communicate to each other the fact that I needed a box of coffee.

39.description: Does my review count if I did not actually complete a transaction here? We walked in here hoping to make use of our Einstein Bros free sandwich vouchers we got from a promotion. On the voucher states that it is "not valid at licensed locations including airports, hospitals and universities." This Einstein is located in the same building as a Doubletree, but I guess I didn't immediate deduce that therefore this must - aha! - be a licensed location instead of a true Einsteins. How I was supposed to come up with this on my own (and perhaps I am just slow or dumb) is still not clear.Anyway, we walk in, and show them our voucher, and cheerfully and politely ask, "Hi, can we use these and what exactly can we use these for?"The service personnel's response?"We don't take those.""WE are not owned by Einstein.""YOU can't use them here."All said in a nasty tone of voice, like we were about to con them out of, well, a sandwich. If it weren't for the rudeness, we would have just bought a sandwich since we were already there. Instead, we left. And I won't ever buy anything from there. Ever.

37.description: First of all this is not a "real" Einstein bagels, they do not have the full menu.  My favorite bagels the deluxe bagels with apples on top or the one with green chiles and cheese on top are not available at this location.  However, since my hubby and I were already there we decided to get something anyways.  I got the pumpkin bagel with pumpkin cream cheese which was good.  My husband had the bagel dog which was about 2 stars, and we split a iced mocha thingy which was probably extremely unhealthy but good.  The service is ok.

0.description: The employees were personable and helpful! I've never seen workers be so helpful after they were no longer working for a tip. Helps that the bagels are great too!

38.description: I've come to expect long waits for our food to come out.  And today, in a move that guaranteed quick food delivery, we tried the bagel dog.  Imagine a hot dog, stuck with a syringe and pumped full of grease, then wrapped with dough that had been mixed with super glue.  I have a low standard for edibility, but this thing was inedible.  Don't get me wrong, Einstein's has great bagels and cream cheese -- oh wait, schmears.  But this location has been disappointing a number of times.

27.description: Need bigger place

32.description: You know when you're visiting a friends house in the morning and they have nothing for breakfast so they go to their freezer and pull out the bag of bagels that wasn't good to begin with but now it's been in there six months and they may as well eat it because there's nothing else around? These bagels tasted about like that.And then, to make matters worse, if you order a peanut butter and jelly bagel, guess what you get?  A horrible bagel and little plastic packets of peanut butter flavored paste and food-coloring jelly which you get to apply all by yourself with cheap plastic utensils that will break when you try to smear the paste. Nothing to see here... move along, move along.

44.description: Hmmmmm.  There is basically no where to eat around where I work, especially since I have boycotted Fox + Obel (its a long story).Anyway, I love bagels, and was stoked about this new location.  But the thing is, everyone working there seems a little off.It's one of those, "Could I please have a turkey sandwich"Girl, "We're out of sandwiches"Me, "Huh?"Girl, "Just kidding, I'm funny."Sigh.Got my food, ran out the door.

24.description: I stayed and attended workshops at the hotel this is connected to for several days, and it became my mainstay for breakfast, lunch, and snacks.  I am not a bagel eater, but I appreciated that I could get hot (albeit instant) oatmeal in the morning, tasty coffee all day, and healthy selections like fruit and turkey chili during the day.  The most impressive thing, however, was how friendly and courteous the staff were.  By my second day they recognized me, and always made me feel welcome.  The manager should be proud of his employees at this location!

7.description: i just stopped by for a quick bite at this location and was very disappointed. I ordered a bagel with butter, coffee and oj. the bagel was toasted and literary several  spoonfuls of butter was slathered on. its soaking with butter...on top of it it looks like the bagel was first smeared with some pink cream cheese, which was then scrapped off before lathering it with butter. - disgusting to say the least. the coffee was lukewarm.

40.description: Oh...this place is a Hot Mess.....I mean, I get it.  I used to work at Einstein's.  I know the trouble that is cutting the bagels, toasting them, spreading on the cream cheese (oh I'm sorry, I mean "schmear"), but please, do these workers have to be soooo apathetic?It takes about 20 minutes to order anything.  And then oftentimes you'll receive the wrong order.  I would give this place 1 star but the food tastes so dang good that's worth 2 stars alone.  But the service is terrible.  If you want the same food but prompt service visit the Einstein's on Rush in the Gold Coast.

30.description: Super convenient being located in the hotel lobby, but way too small inside with a poor layout. They also didn't have all the usual bagel choices and the staff were not particularly friendly. So unless your staying in the hotel and are in a super rush go elsewhere

46.description: I'm not usually negative about things like this...but I have to just completely rip on this Einstein's.I work near this store and I went in today thinking that a bagel with cream cheese would be great for lunch.  After my experience there...I'll never go back!  I usually love Einstein's shmears and I'll continue to go to another one, but definitely not this place.  I come in, wait in line, and finally place my order.  Then I start to wait...and wait..and wait.  So was everyone else around me (there were like 5 people ahead of me).  My observations, in the 15 (15!!!!! for a toasted bagel with cream cheese) minutes that I waited:-4 of the 5 people ahead of me bringing their food back because the order was wrong-A bagel that was thrown on the toaster thing, but didn't make it completely 'on', so it was stuck on the side and started burning and thick smoke filled the store (including the nasty burnt toast smell)-The 4 people working behind the counter chatting with each other when it was clear they were very busy (I'm not talking about chit chat while you work, I mean stopping right there to gossip).-Their manager sitting on his laptop right next to all the action/chaos, not really saying or doing anything.-Them running out of $1 and $5 bills and giving change to people in quarters.-My bagel finally being toasted but then sitting on the counter for another 5 minutes.Finally---I got it.  It was cold at this point, of course, but I was just so amazed that people of this caliber were able to put the two halves of the bagel together, I just left and called it day.

1.description: Really bad service... I waited for 2 bagels not toasted just cream cheese more than 15 minutes and barely costumes inside. There is just one woman preparing the stuffs and two other humans not doing nothing. So slow !!!!!

9.description: No idea why people are so harsh. Granted, I'm more familiar with the West Coast versions of this place, this one holds it own.The cashiers are super friendly and my bagels both times I went were done before I had even finished paying.In the morning I got a cinnamon raisin bagel with cream cheese - exactly how I'd expect to be, nice and toasty and a little too much cream cheese but it's an easy problem to resolve since it smooshes out the sides anyway.In the afternoon I got a bagel thin club - it was surprisingly fantastic, and for only 350 calories?! I'm sold. The vanilla hazelnut coffee is probably my favorite thing about this establishment but it's the same at all of their chains - reliably fantastic!Way better than the standard fake coffee place that most hotels have.

26.description: Had some at a morning meeting and they were fresh and soft. Nothing too extraordinary but pretty good when you are hungry.

25.description: Had breakfast here on my last day in Chicago,very small place but ok staff and good choices in breakfast.

12.description: This place is hit or miss.  I almost always get the same thing, an asiago bagel toasted with light cream cheese.  There is no consistency at all, and yeah I know people put cream cheese on bagels in different ways but sometimes I'm pleased and get a lot of cream cheese and sometimes I barely get any.I waited 18 minutes today for a bagel with cream cheese.  On top of it, they ran out of asiago bagels so despite having already waited 15 minutes I didn't really feel like waiting at least 10 more minutes so I just changed my order to a different type of bagel.  Really frustrating.It's annoying that when you come here, you have no idea who is still waiting for their food and who already got it, so on a day like today when you think there are 4-5 people in front of you - guess what you might be in for a surprise when they call the next number and it's like 20 away from your number.  wtf.

21.description: The first time it was alright This time the egg tasted like cardboard. I couldn't make through half of my bagel

17.description: Nooooo...how can you run out of cream cheese for my bagel. At least I got the bagel toasted nicely and the bagel was still yummy.

10.description: Awesome staff, mediocre food and coffee. I've been to better Einsteins when it comes to coffee quality. But a decent stop, especially with the $8 coupons from skipping housekeeping at the Doubletree. I've seen reviews about the staff being rude; I didn't have any problem with them the three days I was there. I actually thought they were exceptionally friendly.

5.description: Staff was super nice! My husband and I got there about 15 minutes before closing and ordered 6 bagels to go. There was no line, so we were in and out the door in a few minutes-- as the employee handed us our bag, he smiled and said "Wait until you get home to look inside!" When we did later, we was that he gave us not 6 but FIFTEEN bagels-- extra of every flavor we asked for!The cashier was super nice as well, she gave us a 20% discount for having Northwestern ID, so make sure to show yours if you have one.

3.description: Not a good showing for Einstein. The seating area, and in fact the whole store, is small and cramped. It wasn't very clean, as the staff were swamped and seemingly understaffed. The bagels took a while and were only okay. There were no napkins and, upon asking, was told that there were no napkins at all, anywhere in the store. And the soda was horribly mixed. Also, slightly more expensive than normal because it's part of the Doubletree Hotel. Very disappointing.

35.description: One Liner:  Plan to wait for your food.Located in the Doubletree Hotel...not a full Einstein's.
